content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

###Power Generation System
Consists of:
- Boiler (position x=7.0, y=35.5)
- Steam engine (position not specified)
- Connected to copper cable assembler and electronic circuit assembler via power poles

###Manufacturing Area
Consists of:
- Copper cable assembling machine (position not specified)
- Electronic circuit assembling machine (position not specified) with input and output chests
- Small electric poles connecting power from steam engine to both assemblers

ERROR TIPS

###Power Supply Issues
- Ensure consistent power supply to assembling machines by maintaining coal in boilers
- Check power connections between steam engine and assembling machines are properly established

###Resource Management for Assemblers
- Monitor and maintain adequate input materials for assemblers to prevent item ingredient shortages
- Ensure input chests are regularly stocked with required materials (copper cables and iron plates for electronic circuits)

###Entity Status Monitoring
- Regularly check entity status to identify and address issues like power shortages or missing ingredients
- Address NO_POWER status immediately by verifying power network connections and fuel supply
